alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clinton, southeastern Franklin and north central Essex Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peru, Schuyler Falls, Saranac, Wilmington, Au Sable Forks, Dannemora, Peasleeville, Clayburg, Keeseville, Jay In Essex County, Port Kent, Black Brook, Upper Jay, Union Falls, Moffittsville, Ausable Point, Clintonville, Moffitsville, Harkness, and Ausable Forks. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 137 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
